name: Magibullet Shooter Calamity
desc: You can activate "Magibullet" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap Card is activated in the same column as this card (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 "Magibullet" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter Calamity" once per turn.
